content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the moment, for access to the Internet (NOT EPAM internal sites and applications) EPAM guests (customers and partners) is provided with special guest wi-fi accounts.
